title: COVID19 UAE
description: COVID-19 UAE is Ministry of Health’s Official Mobile App on Coronavirus management. The App provides you with real-time Coronavirus cases information and keeps you up to date with regional news & events. If you are general user, the app is a one-stop-shop for all the information you need on COVID-19 including a self-awareness Kit, for patients App offers a full stack of services ranging from Live Calls, Quarantine management and support. Stay Safe and Strong!
